author: jiayi
text:
I attended the HIIT class session with Indra at AF International Plaza and had such a great experience! The workout was well-structured, energetic, and challenging in the best way. The trainer was very motivating and made sure everyone was engaged, while also providing modifications for different fitness levels.

The atmosphere was positive and welcoming, and the facilities were clean and well-maintained. It‚Äôs a great spot to push yourself, burn calories, and leave feeling accomplished. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back for more sessions!

author: Ally Ong
text:
I‚Äôve been visiting this gym for a while now, and it‚Äôs easily become my happy place. The staff are warm and welcoming, the space is spotless, and the layout is well organized, weights are always perfectly reracked like some behind-the-scenes magic is happening. The equipment is well-maintained it‚Äôs spoiled me for other gyms.

Being right in the heart of the CBD, it does get busy during peak hours - think ‚Äúafter-work drinks‚Äù level of packed. If that‚Äôs not your scene, just tweak your workout time and you‚Äôll have a much smoother experience. The gym is in an older building, which makes its location perfect but also means a little consideration goes a long way: don‚Äôt slam the weights (nobody needs a surprise earthquake drill), and be ready to share machines when it‚Äôs busy.

I train with Mansor, and honestly, it‚Äôs one of the best decisions I‚Äôve ever made. He really knows his stuff and has a sharp eye for safety. Mansor has this rare mix of pushing you to your limits while keeping you grounded, so you‚Äôre not just building a Greek god physique, but also the mental toughness to take on the world (or at least your corporate inbox). He might look a little intimidating at first because he enforces the rules (rerack your weights, don‚Äôt slam, don‚Äôt do anything dangerous), but really, he‚Äôs one of the friendliest people you‚Äôll meet as long as you‚Äôre not the person trying to turn the gym into a demolition site.

And if you‚Äôre curious, check out the PT packages. They‚Äôre not just for lifting, you can use them for stretching sessions, or even kickboxing if you need to release some steam after a rough day at the office.

All in all, this gym is a gem. Show up, be respectful, rerack your weights, and don‚Äôt be that person, don‚Äôt hog machine. If everyone does their part, we‚Äôll all keep enjoying this convenient, vibrant spot in the CBD, a place where you can laugh, sweat, and recharge, together.

author: Ken Jack
text: The gym itself is fine, but the personal trainers tend to have a very bad attitude, especially the one with glasses. I have had an extremely unpleasant experience with the same guy two times already. He has been acting like he owns the place and taken over a machine I was using. The way he talked to me was so aggressive that I felt uncomfortable being around. I hope in some way they will have the trainer learn how to speak with the gym users in nicer ways (he seems to be a nice guy towards his ‚Äúcustomers‚Äù) but if the situation persists, I guess I will have to report it to the HQ of Anytime Fitness.

author: Jackson Greenwood
text: Hands down the worst gym ever. I decided to give this gym a try as my current gym was renovating. From the moment I step inside the gym, I started getting sized up by the male trainers, they were predominantly of the malay ethnicity. My colleagues that uses this gym sometimes also said the trainers are quite unprofessional and always chat up their lady friends should they join them in the gym. The gym have a smell of undried towels near the free weights area too. Would give 0 stars if possible. Worst gym In the world!

author: Hannah Teo
text:
Hands down - my favorite AF outlet ever. The spacing of the equipment is great, as the gym does not try to pack a bunch of equipment into a tight space. But more importantly, vibes are good here - largely in part to the trainers, who are the friendliest folks you'd ever meet!

I recently had a morning workout here - and three of them noticed that I was displaying symptoms of low blood sugar. So they approached to check up on me, gave me some dates from their own pockets, and gave me tips on what I can do the next time this happens.

Beyond this incident, they're always all smiles - and also very willing to help you with your form etc., even if they aren't attached to you as your personal trainer.

So happy to have found this gym :)

author: Regina T
text:
This is honestly one of my favourite AF outlets! It‚Äôs conveniently located, well equipped yet spacious, and very well maintained too.

Above all, the vibes are great! Staff and trainers here are so friendly, which makes it welcoming even if it‚Äôs your first time at the gym - so would highly recommend coming here if you‚Äôre a little shy!

author: Karin Ng
text: Spend most of my sessions here, love the location and wide variety of equipments! Trainers and staffs are friendly as well & really love being very comfortable in this gym! Equipments are sufficient and widely spread across. Love the space of the gym too :) Shower and toilet is well maintained and clean too.

author: Ryan Wong
text:
There are many good gyms across Singapore, but to find a great gym is always a bonus. Anytime Fitness Tanjong Pagar (located within International Plaza) is an example of a great gym: the spacing between equipment is good, the equipment are all generally well-maintained, the staff and fellow gym goers are polite to each other, and I think manager Azri with his team of Personal Trainers do a good job in creating a positive and inclusive environment where members and first timers feel comfortable and safe training at their own pace.

I personally train with Muhammad and he does a phenomenal job of not just training you physically, but he also takes the time and effort to check on your personal wellbeing as well, such as how your food intake is going, and how your stress levels are. There are many good Personal Trainers out there, but a great one like Muhammad is always hard to find.

5 stars for Anytime Fitness Tanjong Pagar, and definitely 5 stars for PT Muhammad!

author: Tan Jun Kang
text:
Anytime Fitness International Plaza is an excellent gym that is always clean, well maintained, and welcoming. The environment feels friendly and motivating ‚Äî trainers and members alike treat each other more like friends than strangers.
I have been training with Mansor, and the experience has been transformative. He has helped me improve my physical fitness significantly, and I‚Äôve also observed the impressive results he has achieved with his other clients. His approach is both professional and encouraging, making every session effective and enjoyable.
Highly recommended for anyone looking for a supportive and well-kept gym in the CBD!

author: Terry Samuels
text: A gym with a very ‚ÄúCalifornia Fitness‚Äù vibe. The instructors seem more interested in engaging with the ladies than providing professional guidance. While sitting near a machine, I overheard an instructor mocking another member to his client ‚Äî ironically, the person he was mocking was lifting impressively and doing a workout the instructor himself probably couldn‚Äôt manage. Not the kind of Anytime Fitness I‚Äôd return to, especially when instructors are busy sizing up guys and acting cheeky only with the girls. Don‚Äôt do it so obviously, or at least don‚Äôt make comments that could be heard by members.

author: CHOO SZE MING
text:
You can express a gym like this. It's very good.

This gym is fully equipped, clean and very professional.
The coach is very professional, with rich courses, suitable for people with different fitness needs.
The equipment is novel, well maintained, and the exercise experience is great.
The service attitude is very good, the atmosphere is positive, and it is very motivated to exercise here.
High cost performance, is an ideal place for fitness enthusiasts.

author: Daniel Ng
text:
Located within International Plaza. Do have a look at their IG on directions to get there because it's in a relatively obscure corner.

Pretty basic AF here with the basics. Dumbbells are hammer strength which go up in increments of 2kg. Otherwise, the gym is maintained well and equipments are all working well.

Toilets are also really nice and clean with 5 showers in the male toilet and plenty of room to put your belongings.

Overall the gym is well laid out and spacious. A good gym for gen pop and recreational lifters who work in the CBD. Not the best for serious lifters because you won't have a ton of leg equipment.

UPDATE 14/3:
The gym has expanded and added a few more power racks as well as lifting platforms, feels even more spacious now!

author: Serena Sim
text: Located at a very convenient location, big and spacious gym with lots of machine options available which makes training here easy. Staffs are also friendly, always smiling and helping whenever they can, making it a really nice and welcoming place to get a workout in.

author: Tony
text: Very friendly staff and well-maintained equipments. Super convenient access around the CBD area. Recommend Indra for personal training!

author: Random Random
text:
Even though AF claims you can use your access worldwide, this gym does not allow you to do so.

I was visiting Singapore for business travel, and wanted to use the gym. But I couldn‚Äôt tap in with my keyfob for some reason, there‚Äôs no AF personnel either.

I think AF should look into their policy again ‚Äî this clearly a violation of member benefit if their selling point is worldwide access.

author: Santosh Nair
text: Anytime Fitness, Tanjong Pager is the best branch of ATF I have come across.. expansive area with almost all of Fitness equipments, helpful and cheerful staff..Feel like coming everyday.

author: Bee Li Lim
text: This is the best Anytime Fitness branch that I had been to. It has a wide range of machines and fitness equipment, good for training any parts of the body that you wish to train that day. Other than the fantastic range and up to date equipment, I also would like to commend on the Personal Trainers there who are ever so friendly and willing to assist you, especially Mr Mansor. Never seen another trainer who takes care of this branch better than him! Marvellous training location. Music‚Äôs great too.

author: Indra Saidon
text: Simply an amazing gym. Tried out the gym as we are Anytime Fitness members and happened to be in the area so we decided to give this outlet a go. We were surprised by how spacious, well planned out, neat and clean this gym is. Showers and lockers are very clean and tidy too. The gym is very well equipped to perform plenty of workouts with new & well maintained equipments and machines. Not to mention, the staff here are very friendly and welcoming, you wouldn‚Äôt feel intimidated at all being here. Had a word with one of the staff and could definitely see that they‚Äôre trying to build a great culture within the gym. Definitely going in the list of my favourite gyms to head to.

author: Jiawen Yip
text: Incredible class! The energy was so motivating and the workout had me sweating buckets. Left feeling exhausted and accomplished. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a fun, effective workout!

author: ÁâáÈáéÁ•êÊñó Yuto Katano
text: I‚Äôve been to many Anytime Fitness in Singapore(even in Japan!) and this Anytime Fitness has a lot of shower room! And there‚Äôs a vending machine to get more protein and I bought lean body with 7 dollars I think. It was so tasty after workout. Workout machines are many and you have many choices.

author: Xeno Xidal
text:
too crowded at busy hours, always have to wait for each machine. good luck doing supersets of any kind. Much rather prefer the outlet at Buona for peak hour.

Buona doesn't have overbearing "coaches" as well. Some of these coaches in TP outlet like to chat with the members, which distract them and make the waiting time for machines even longer. And if they got no one to chat, feels like you're being watched all the time, not comfortable, especially one of them who is not friendly at all. In Buona you get to do ur exercises in peace with nobody watching over you

author: Rebecca Koh
text: Have visited multiple locations and this is indeed the best outlet in terms of space, equipment, and most importantly, cleanliness of the washrooms. Looked and smelled clean with plenty of storage space for bags and office outfits.

author: Mathan Vino
text:
Excellent gym with great facilities! The trainers are very professional and friendly. They have all types of modern equipment for a complete workout. The washroom facilities are well-maintained. The trainers are kind and always ready to help. I highly recommend this gym for anyone looking to start their fitness journey.

Rating: 5/5 ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Mathan Tom üíû

author: Mohd Irwan
text:
Friendly staffs and trainers. Equipment well maintained and place is kept clean at all times.. One of the best AF I've visited and no regrets on coming here.  The staffs here always motivate us and gave us tips in workouts and well balance diet. A place that I will always recommend my gym enthusiasts mate to visit.
Thank you AF Tanjong Pagar.

author: Boon Harry
text: One of the worst AFs i been, from the attitude of the management to the smell in the gym. Thumbs down. Do not recommend. Go nearby YSY or raffles place much betterüí™üí™ ‚Ä¶

author: Celene Teng
text: did my PT sessions with PT Indra, really catered the session to what i was working towards and ensured that my form was correct. Really recommend if you are working towards an athlete focused workout!

author: Felina Stewart
text: Sending my heartfelt gratitude to Mansor your fitness trainer for finding my Tag watch and most importantly keeping it for me. His intergrity is greatly appreciated as the watch was a sentimental item close to my heart. Mansor should be praised and recognised by the management. Coming 1year plus as a member, I have never met such a thoughtful and awesome staff! Well done and continue to do what you so well, you are a Gem!

author: Yati Saat
text:
Testimonial:

Here‚Äôs the start to my fitness journey.
Been going to Anytime Fitness Tanjong Pagar since January and I must say, I do enjoy it.

As a beginner, I engaged Muhammad as my personal trainer. üí™
Training with Muhammad have always been pushing my strength and understanding my weakness.
I feel comfortable knowing that he‚Äôs there to guide me and slowly build up the intensity of each workout üèãÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. It‚Äôs structured but gruelling.
With his expertise & knowledge, you will definitely achieve your expected goals.üèÜ

I was 85kg before signed up with AFTGP. I‚Äôve lost 12kg in 3 months!
I‚Äôm 73kg now! A big achievement so far. üèÜ

Thank you Muhammad for the past few sessions and being patient with me.

author: Spartan Dan
text:
First time here. Seeing 7 squat racks makes me very excited. It's a huge gym.
Very impressed with it. Plus the weights are all arranged in their respective weight. It's a first time. Maybe I'm lucky I went on a day when it's not crowded and they just arranged the weights . Nice. Good ambience as well.

author: Regina Loo
text: Anytime Fitness staff at TP has been very welcoming and you dont feel intimidating coming here for the first time. AF at TP is approachable and helpful to guide you easily on the equipments available. I have been coming here regularly for the past 1-2years and they have not disappoint since!

author: Timofey Dakhnovskiy
text: My favourite branch of all in Sg. Equipment is stellar, but most importantly the trainer team is incredible. The most fun and receptive team I have ever encountered in all my time gymming. Will this place as I have relocate out of Sg

author: Will
text:
Friendly lady staff who saw me taking a pic and came out to befriend and orientate me. Did not hard sell any package.

Totally friendly.

Lots of equipment and separated male/female bath / toilet. At least 3 cubicles for each.

#3 , side further away from the escalator.

author: amdeefitness
text: This is one of the AF gym outlets we frequent. We like the squat racks and especially love how clean and neat the place is. No chalk, no slamming of weights, and all weights are neatly replaced and sorted according to size!! Love this in a gym, especially since we are neat freaks haha. This outlet smells clean as well because there seems to be a citrus fragrance used throughout the place.

author: Sischa AmeliaArdiansyh
text:
The best gym in the universe. Very clean, well maintain,  wide. Had a good smell
The staff treat you like a family. Lovely..
Highly recommended

author: Keynes Wang
text: They offer a one-month membership, which is very useful for foreigners like me who are staying in Singapore for a short period of time. I purchased a one-month membership in September and found it very convenient to exercise here for a month. Then, I went back to Korea for three weeks and came back to Singapore a few days ago. And I re-registered here. The reason I chose this place again is the staff is very nice to me especiallly Rainey and Muhammad.üòÑ actually I‚Äôm not good at speaking English bit they helped me to use gym more comfortably. Thanks to them, I was able to exercise comfortably here. This place is small in scale, but it has three squat racks, so even during peak hours, I can comfortably do freeweight workout.

author: Andy Pudmenzky
text: Great modem gym with well maintained machinery. We were the only ones there when we went on a Saturday morning at around 7am. The vending machine didn't have very many options (some pre workout would have been good), but otherwise good. Empty, clean, spacious and a great gym session all round üí™üëç ‚Ä¶

author: Florian Parzhuber
text: Beautiful gym after the new renovation with plenty of machines to choose from. Especially the adductor machines and the 3 power racks are great for leg training. Staff is friendly and the gym is very well-lit and clean. Highly recommended.

author: Curtis Mathers
text:
Gym 3/10 (old and particular stench).
Management -10/10 ( never seen such a joke before, i dont usually laugh but damnüòÇ)
Atmosphere 5/10 ‚Ä¶

author: yl
text: Have been coming to this gym since late 2020    . Have visited even more after the revamp, enjoyable experience with all the new equipment. They also have friendly staff. Place is also kept clean and neat.

author: S J
text:
Best staff, atmosphere and equipment for exercise!

I've been to many gyms in Singapore, but among them, ANYTIME FITNESS Tanjong Pagar is the most preferred and satisfied among all energy, staff, and organizations. There's a reason why it's the number one AF branch in Singapore :)
It's energy and people. It's so nice.

I'm getting PT, and the PT trainers are amazing . I'm so happy and recommend it :)

author: jac ho
text:
I did had a great experience with my personal trainer Muhammad, it's long journey to lose 15kg within 6mths. Muhammad did a good job balancing my diet and workout plan. Thank you Muhammad üòä.

Overall it's nice gym to workout with nice music to boost up. üòä

author: Josephine Agatha Hemingway
text: I really enjoyed my gym experience here! I‚Äôm a gym beginner but the staff here are super friendly, make me motivated and enjoy coming to the gym and get fit. they are very helpful in correcting my form, offering advice and teaching me new things. the equipment provided are also very well maintained and there‚Äôs quite a variety of equipments too, clean environment! highly recommend! :)

author: Clement Sim
text:
This is one of my favourite branches of Anytime Fitness in Singapore for numerous reasons.

1. The variety of weights and equipment is incredible including three squaring racks, a Smith machine, a whole set of dumbbells and all the machines you can possibly need for a great workout.
2. The staff are extremely friendly and professional! Always pleasant to interact with them.
3. The location is great and easily accessible.
4. All the equipment are well-maintained and safe.
5. The changing rooms are clean with both showers and toilets available.
6. There are sufficient day shelves for you to use.
7. They always play great music (at least for me).

While I need to travel a fair bit to this outlet from home, this has been and always will be my preferred gym if I have the time to spare!

author: szehui foo
text:
The toilet is separated, not unisex toilet. That‚Äôs what I‚Äôm really thankful for and it‚Äôs really clean. Really enjoy going to this outlet even though I stay in the east. The travelling distance is worth the time

I feel really comfortable at this outlet cause I‚Äôm really new to gym, I don‚Äôt feel intimidated at all while I‚Äôm figuring out how to use the equipment.

The staff are very friendly, helpful as well. Equipments are kept clean.
There‚Äôs good culture being practiced here, staff looking out for safety, enforcing cleanliness.

Edit: 1 year on and still one of my favourite outlet. The outlet has expanded as well. Staff are really friendly and approachable. For someone new to the gym and unsure of the usage of some of the equipment, they were keen to help. Always feel happy to go to Tanjong outlet.

author: Ris
text:
This may not be my home outlet but its top of my favourites list. It‚Äôs very spacious(compared to other outlets) and has majority of the equipment and machines. Cleanliness of the gym and the toilet 10/10. May be a little packed during after-work hours but the gym is large enough to accommodate the crowd.
Would like to specially give a shout out to Mansor who was very helpful as he saw I was finding the ankle strap and offered to not only find them for me but also taught me how to use them (it was ones which i‚Äôve never used before). He was super friendly, shared about the gym and offered me
advice on my workout. Really made my day!! Definitely coming by this outlet more often in the future. üòä

author: Sam Seah
text:
Well equipped gym in the CBD and have attached toilets and bathroom as well.
I like the vibe and energy here especially from one of your staff member named Mansor, he is very welcoming and helpful too. Keep up the good work.

author: gorghieous
text: Been a member of this gym for years now, and I would say that this is my most favorite AF in SG. Place is clean, ambiance is nice, and more importantly, the staff are amazing. The place recently were expanded and I am beyond happy and excited to always come back here to work out. This place has always been my happy place. Congrats AFTP for the recent expansion. I will keep supporting my favorite gym. Always ü´∂üèª

author: Lionel Lee
text:
One of the best Anytime Fitness gyms in Singapore: location is central (within the CBD area), premise is spacious and clean, well-lit and features seating area, showers, and locker facilities. Equipment-wise, everything is well-maintained and boasts a wide range of machines and racks that provide options for casual gym goers to bodybuilders and everyone else in between.

The trainers there are mostly experienced and warm: many of them are happy to give you a hand with the equipment adjustments or even workout tips. My personal recommendation is Amirr - he's not only a fitness and nutrition maven, but also provides services in muscle release massage and injury recovery too.

author: Kelvin Ang
text: One of the most well maintained AF branch that I have been to; clean, spacious and well equipped! Conveniently located just at international plaza beside Tanjong Pagar MRT.

author: Loo Sabrina
text: I joined hiit every Wednesday without fail. The trainer Indra is very experience and I have seen progress in my endurance and strength trsininvy

author: Amanda
text: Good PT lessons with Coach Indra. Motivating and always maintain safety first.

author: jackd
text: Gym management is very dubious. Ban and suspend people without a courtesy of informing the reasons for doing so. Facilities are extensive but the management is very questionable hence potential members really need to consider real hard before signing up at Tanjong Pagar Anytime Fitness

author: Fahd Siddiqui
text:
I have been visiting quite a few different AF outlets since my home gym is under renovation and I personally believe AF TP is the best in Singapore when all things are considered.
- Firstly toilets,shower and changing rooms are well integrated into the gym and have decent amount of space.
- Although it's in the heart of Singapore they don't comprise on space or equipment so it doesn't feel like your constantly squeezing around the gym.
- Plenty of benches and dumbbells which are usually the most used equipment so it's unlikely you will have to wait to use them.
- Extremely friendly staff
- Clean gym and availability of wipes to clean ur equipment
- Extra accessories in the gym available like many different cable accessories, weight belt and foam rollers( Only missing the double rope which city hall has)
If your in need of a gym in the city or near work this is the best option also conveniently located above Tanjong pagar MRT.

author: Siew Wei Wong
text:
I cannot thank the staffs at AF Tanjong Pagar enough for their exceptional service and genuine care. Today, I had the privilege of experiencing their outstanding commitment to their customers.

A special shout-out goes to the senior trainers who went above and beyond to help me find my lost phone. Their expertise and quick thinking were instrumental in resolving the situation. Their kindness and patience throughout the process truly made a difference.

The entire team at AF Tanjong Pagar exudes professionalism and a genuine concern for their customers' well-being. Their dedication to providing top-notch service is evident in every interaction.

I am grateful for their assistance today and am consistently impressed with the level of service I receive at this establishment. Kudos to the entire team for their outstanding work!

author: Chay
text: One of my favourite gym because of the location. And the staffs are nice. =D

author: Zenson Lim
text:
I can't say enough good things about Anytime Fitness Tanjong Pagar. The staff is incredibly friendly and always ready to assist. The gym is impressively well-equipped, making every workout a pleasure. I love the 24/7 access, which fits perfectly into my busy schedule. It's not just a gym; it's a fitness haven. Highly recommended.

Downside: cleaner cleans the toilet during timings when there's a huge crowd, causing congestion. Especially since there're only 2 cubiclesüòÖ (the cleaner is friendly and does an excellent job, just wrong timingXD)

author: Dinie
text:
Superb facilities, great friendly staff,so that makes it a wholesome experience.

Everyone is masked up well especially with the current covid situation so that is really good.

Spacious. I literally travel 30mins just to be here. That's a testament of how much I like working out here.

Check it out peeps.

author: Perng Aw
text: I've been to quite a few Anytime Fitness and this by far is the best one. Not only is the gym clean, organized and new but it has a sense of community. The minute I walked as a first-time visitor, I was greeted by Mansoor who made me feel welcomed. I will definitely be coming back regularly.

author: hafiz jumahat
text:
Big and spacious. The only Anytime Fitness that has male/female shower room while the rest are unisex. Staffs are friendly.

No weightlifting platform so not an ideal place for powerlifters to train as you're not suppose to drop weights there. It's also a good thing so that the gym is not crowded with lifters hogging equipments for more than an hour.

author: Annie Yuan
text:
edit: it looks like the AC issue wasn‚Äôt fixed after all (and continues to get worse, as this gym is now busier and the number of people packed into the space with only a handful of functioning fans makes it nearly impossible to breathe much less exercise). dropping another star until they get some proper ventilation going. i also echo another reviewer‚Äôs sentiment about the music - it‚Äôs unbearably loud after hours. shame because this is a beautiful, well-equipped gym.

my only gripe with this gym before the recent renovation was the lack of AC. now post-expansion they‚Äôve not only added a functioning AC, they‚Äôve also added two brand new deadlifting platforms and four squat racks. easily my favourite anytime fitness location in singapore now - will likely switch my default over from bugis to this one.

author: Patrick Uchiha
text:
There‚Äôs a female staff that‚Äôs very rude and impolite. I‚Äôm racking back the weights halfway at squat rack , and this staff started coming forward to micromanage me, telling me to put the weights in their specific weight spots. Hello, I‚Äôm already re-racking, why you coming up to me like I‚Äôm not racking?

After sometime while using other machines, I glanced back and noticed the squat rack had a 3plate load each side with no person on it. Why never enforce other people to rack back weights? Favouritism much?

Other wise, the gym is okay. Plenty of food options around, and conveniently near MRT.

author: Cili Crab
text: I find the gym satisfactory, but the behavior of the trainer (buff & tanned) was unacceptable. While I was using dumbbells, he rudely seized them for his client without even bothering to inquire if we could share. Lack of respect and courtesy.

author: Nur Amelina
text: One of the most spacious gym in CBD area! The expansion has made my workout more convenient! The staffs were all very friendly and outgoing making the trip to the gym more enticing!

author: Diyou Lin
text:
A very complete gym with top notch equipment, especially after the recent renovation.

Have been training here with a fantastic PT, Amirr, & results have exceeded expectations. Definitely many levels above PTs elsewhere, in terms of training execution & diet plans. He always tailors both to suit your aims & is genuinely invested in seeing his clients progress.

author: terence ong
text: Visited this outlet yesterday , Machines are spaced out from each other, allow members to charged their phone and also has toilets within the fitness Gym.. Important to have toilet inside Gym so that members do not need to find toilet outside. Well Done.

author: Daphne Pan
text:
Went to reactivate back my membership and was pleasantly surprised to see the entire gym undergo a revamp that made the place so much more welcoming. The place feels brighter, old squeaky equipments have been removed, newer machines have been added.

The staff (Jay & Mansor) are super friendly and helpful. They are very patient with our questions, and are always ready for a laugh. Highly recommended!

author: Marcus Goh
text: After the management from Anytime Fitness Marine Parade took over, the entire gym has been revamped. The old and squeaky equipment has been replaced with new top of the line ones and the new renovated space provides a workout experience unmatched by other ‚Äúhigher end‚Äù gyms that charge 3 times as much. Jay the General Manager truly embodies great service and the trainers are incredibly qualified and extremely professional. This gym is truly the goal standard that all other gyms should aim for.

author: Yiwei Sim
text:
The gym just expanded to accommodate more users and new variety of machines to train with. Trainers are friendly and always put on a smile. The gym used to be very crowded due to influx of new users. The expansion was a right move by the owner.üëçüèª

Adrian.S

author: Christopher Mayer
text:
This place keeps getting better. Have been a member here for over two years. New management came in about a year ago and the equipment, set up, and general usability of the gym have improved significantly.

This is a lifters gym (which I enjoy). It doesn't have a lot of the bells and whistles and isn't the best for classes or the like except strength training and some HIIT; although they are starting to bring in some interesting equipment and they do hold group classes often. They also have excellent personal trainers if your pocket is deep enough...

Bathrooms are not great, but functional.
Everything else is great!

author: Sen Huay Lim
text:
What a huge surprise to come back to anytime fitness Tanjong Pagar and discover the gym had a change of management and the new owners had taken feedback from current members to make the gym cleaner and brighter..its now having good vibes all around.
Lo and behold!! New and latest top of the line treadmills, elliptical cross trainers from Life Fitness.
The new trainers now greet me whenever I see them and it really brings a smile to my workout.
Heard from the grapevine more to come in terms of equipment, I am eagerly looking forward to it.
Easily one of the best gym in the CBD, the differences between this management and the previous one was easily day and night and these folks sure know how to run a good and successful gym all members would be happy to come.

author: Ashton Lee
text:
It is a really good gym with complete equipments. I love it veryyy much. Unfortunately the music (like some bad clubbing music) at night (11pm++) is so deafening that even someone who is in the coffin would wake up to turn it off because it is TOO LOUD.

Please turn the volume down, i beg you‚Ä¶6/5 star if the music is not that loud!

author: aws tan
text:
1st time in this branch at 8am to take a look before heading to work, equipment is good, but staff is really rude n aggressive. Forcing me to put back weights that are already on the machines even before i came in. Horrible attitude. Told me he checked cctv that i last used the machine n insist i put them back. Come on bro, having big muscles doesn't mean ppl need to be afraid of u.. wake up and learn to treat customers politely. You are paid because of our membership fee, hope u will learn from your mistake.
I sincerely hope the gym management will discipline him. Will never return.

To fellow members, there are many other branches with friendly staff, i recommend that you stay away if this is not your home gym..

author: Jesse Adam
text: May not have a weightlifting platform, but honestly one of the best place to go if you don't want to almost get into fights with kids. Weights are re-racked, and equipment are cleaned after use (perhaps due to the culture built and enforced by the staff). Honestly, those who complain about being told off when they don't rerack or clean the equipment after use should go to City Hall. It'll be heaven for them.

author: Regina Tan
text:
really love the vibes here at the Tanjong Pagar AF! being pretty new to gym, Mansor was super friendly + encouraging and played a huge part in helping me settle in comfortably üòã

facilities wise, it‚Äôs quite spacious and not too crowded too. plus, the whole area is always kept nice and clean, so the overall atmosphere is great! the toilets are also separated and not the combined unisex one, which is great !!

author: Ambika
text: AFTGP has been hands down the best AF experience I‚Äôve had so far. The trainers are very knowledgeable and welcoming and the equipment is very well maintained. Especially would like to mention trainer Mansor for being the heart and soul of the gym- always happy to take care of and guide newcomers. Even though I don‚Äôt get personal training from him, he‚Äôs helped me out on numerous occasions to improve my form, manage my injuries and also give me life advice. I see everyone feeling safe, happy and ready to train I‚Äôm aftgp which a fanstastic and keeps the regulars coming back to trainüí™

author: Tim Lee
text: One of the most central located AF branches in CBD. Guys there are always pleasant and has good vibes. Good set of bars and benches to accommodate all workout. Two negatives - toilets has been pretty dirty and no space for muscle ups

author: O Chen
text: Great gym. Probably one of the best in Singapore. The owner also owns the City Hall gym. Highly recommend for expats. Probably the most similar gym to a ‚Äònormal‚Äô gym in Australia.

author: Edlind Ng
text: Really love this gym and the community it is growing! Owners are very friendly and welcoming, always ready to give tips on workouts. Excellent range of new equipment with unique machines too. Thank you Manager Jay and Trainer Mansor!

author: Winnie Toh
text:
Recently, we decided to resume our gym routine and checked out International Plaza again.

We were happy that the place was revamped well and the machines were changed/ upgraded. It is more conducive for workout now!

Most importantly, the current management team are a bunch of friendly, professional and helpful folks who made the entire gym ambience a cosy place to be at!

Cheers to Jay & Mansor for all the great enthusiasm and effort! :)

author: Timothy Studlo
text: I have been a patron of the brand Anytime Fitness for seven years and visited many outlets throughout the world. Anytime Fitness Tanjong Pagar outlet is one the best I have ever visited worldwide. In the past three months this outlet has had a complete overhaul of the entire gym  with new facilities, all brand new equipment, and new staff. The atmosphere is friendly, clean, engaging, and conducive for a top quality workout. The staff is super helpful providing you assistance at the drop of a hat. If you're looking for a trainer look no further. Anytime Fitness has some of the most knowledgeable and caring trainers you can find (I recommend Mansor). They're focused on you the entire time you train helping you to achieve your goal. They also use data driven metrics (body composition analyser machine) to analyse your progress and differentiate your workout to your individual needs. The gym offers plenty of space so it never feels crowded and it runs 24/7 so you can find a time that works for you. Finally, this is a gym that welcomes all types of people form beginners to experienced gym rats, from young to old, guys and girls. It's really place were you don't feel intimated and you can do your work! Thanks Any Time TP you guys rock!

author: Ian Martin
text: I am blessed to be able to travel a lot and have visited many gyms on those travels.  I can say with all sincerity Anytime Fitness Tanjong Pagar is one of the best.  It is clean, well run and has an excellent range of equipment.  Further more, the staff are extremely pleasent, welcoming and very helpful.  I had a total of 11 hours training while on holiday in Singapore @ AF Tanjong Pager and this was also some of the best I have experienced.  My person thanks goes out to Mansor Mohd Yusof, my trainer and to Sulaiman Hamzah the owner, for making my visit so memorable.

author: Josephine Kwok
text: I‚Äôve been training with PT Affandy for 5 months. He is very patient and gentle. Not forceful with his training but very effective. I enjoy every training session and I felt gradual change in my fitness. I recently went on a trip and found myself much fitter and in better shape. Thank you Affandy!

author: fadzil Matin
text: Azri was a real nice guy, very welcoming and very friendly as well. really recommend this place if u‚Äôre looking to start ur membership

author: Oz
text: Solid gym, had a good workout on Saturday. Unfortunately front desk is not staffed on Sundays and on workday it is staffed only from 12PM so if you‚Äôre traveling and looking to train, tonight luck. Real shame.

author: George-Edward Putong
text: I'm very happy with the onboarding. From signing up to being offered a one-off training session. I've read other reviews and agree there's a great vibe at AF Tanjong Pagar. It's clean, the layout is excellent, and the staff I've met are kind. Shah explained the sign-up process smoothly. Jay, one of the PTs, gave an excellent one-off training session (encouraging you with the right push) but without any pressure to sign-up for anything. You simply feel supported. üëçüèº I'm one of those who are a little nervous returning to the gym after X years... but I feel comfortable at AF Tanjong Pagar. Cheers to the AF Tanjong Pagar team (and extra kudos to the people who keep the gym clean).

author: S Jack
text: One of the best maintained anytime fitness gyms. Friendly staffs and good vibes!

author: C
text:
Was searching for gyms around this area. Found this to be the most value for money gym around here! The equipment are all very new and well maintained.

The staff esp haikal are really friendly. Free classes like yoga, pilates and cardio workouts are also available. Absolute steal!

author: Ernest
text: Great experience every session! Gym is well planned out, clean and tidy. Staffs are all very friendly and the culture here they created is superb! Always looking forward to coming here üëçüèª ‚Ä¶

author: JiaQi Loh
text:
I attended the HIIT class session at AF International Plaza and had such a great experience! The workout was well-structured, energetic, and challenging in the best way. The trainer was very motivating and made sure everyone was engaged, while also providing modifications for different fitness levels.

The atmosphere was positive and welcoming, and the facilities were clean and well-maintained. It‚Äôs a great spot to push yourself, burn calories, and leave feeling accomplished. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back for more sessions!

author: „Åì„Å∞„ÇÑ„Åó „É¨„Ç™
text:
The gym is ok.
But they have some of the worst gym bullies there. One of them asked to share the equipment (for chest workout) but in an unfriendly tone, while he was doing back, which was fine. So I let him use, and when it's my turn again, it was my last set and after I did a few reps, I wanted to drop the weight and continue to do a few more reps but he wouldn't let me. He said it's his turn. Omg. Then after he finished that set, he came to me and asked "what's your name? what's your problem?" Omgggg
Then another day I encountered another guy. He just "growls" a lot when he's working out, very loudly that the whole gym can hear him. And he puts the bar on the metal racks very loudly too. And when he's using other equipments, he also lets go at the highest point such that the metals just clash super loudly. It's like he wanna break the equipments. When he asked to share the dumbbell or equipment, he would say something like "can I share this since you are looking at your phone?" Helloooo, everyone needs to rest between set. Looking at handphone to reply messages for 30seconds is normal. And rest between sets can last for 1 to 2 minutes also. Why can't I look at handphones? You can ask to share and I don't mind sharing. But the attitude is bad.

And the water flow from the sinks at the basin and water dispenser is extremely slowww.
Also, the cleaner likes to vacuum and mop behind u and the vacuum and mop would just hit ur feet. And u can tell it's intentional coz he can totally see u standing there and it happens many times. I don't understand why he could not just say "excuse me" or just simply not mop so close. The fact that it looks intentional is really irritating.
And the cleaning of toilet and changing room always happens during 6-7pm where it's usually when most people come to gym and get changed...

Starting next week I think I will purposely take a bus to the next nearest AF branch to work out (this branch is just opposite my office and is super convenient for me but I'd rather travel to gym).

author: Benedict Chia
text:
I was at the gym training with a family member. I was just guiding her on how to perform specific exercises properly.

Half way through my workout, the club manager called me into the office accusing me of conducting personal training sessions. She was rude and unfriendly. 0 justification, 0 customer service.

Asked around and some of my friends have encountered the same problem with her too.
Maybe then they should remove the notice on their notice board that says ‚Äúfind a training partner‚Äù then.

Definitely not going back there. Will get my family member to transfer her membership to another branch as well

author: Josh Loke
text:
This gym has extremely rude staff and very poor equipment. Despite the fact that I stay nearby, I prefer going to Raffles place and Tiong Bahru. Their equipment is better, and their staff are more friendly.

Edit to respond to the owner: I have checked with both Tiong Bahru and Raffles Place gym staff on this supposed policy. There has been no such policy from the sports council, you are allowed to have mask off doing strenuous exercise if you are vaccinated.

Furthermore, it is the tone in which this staff put across. Very rude, almost to the point of yelling at me. As the owner indicated, this is not my first visit there.

author: Dev Bhatt
text: An oasis in the city ‚Äì a place for us to leave our office worries at the door and focus on self-development. Spick and span, this gym is top class, and credits go to Sulaiman for setting everything up with the customer in mind. I rarely write reviews, but I felt it would be a disservice to all the hard work the team at AFTP has put in if I didn‚Äôt share my views. Keep lifting!

author: benjemyn lin
text: Wonderful place to workout! The recent change of staff and management has lifted the atmosphere of the gym substantially. I was also pleasantly surprised that they were open during Chinese New Year, allowing me to maintain my workout regimen. Would definitely drop by again!

author: Grey Blanket
text: One of the cleanest and most neat gym. The renovation is phenomenal. Incredibly friendly staff and trainers. Been a member of anytime fitness for more than 5 years and this is my favorite outlet.

author: LLL Kingslayer
text:
At first , I would like to share my experience . I been training since I‚Äôm teenager it is around 10 years of proper training in ‚Äúproper gym ‚Äú. I joined most expensive gym ( $259 per month) and cheapest gym which is Dennis gym ( 6 month $200+ ) in singapore . And also California gym , virgin active , gymmboxx and etc many of them . I like to training in different place . It‚Äôs give me a lot of motivation .  I think I had ‚Äú the right condition ‚Äú  to tell  you all of ‚Äú my opinion ‚Äú for choosing gym for rate  0-100 .
The atmosphere is good . AC is cool enough . Good location . This is the only reason I come here often after I moved to the city area . Gym located level 3 . Please note that a lot of office or shop below the level , so they probably
show you their phone because they get complaints / feedback from their neighbors. Obviously ,
Soundproof is poor . If you training heavy and hard you should no go there . They will judge you from start till you end . And then u must remember / guess  where‚Äôs those weight come from . They will judge you like they judge me . stared at me from top to bottom like I‚Äôm a guilty person because I don‚Äôt place the weights to the correct place . but guess what ? That‚Äôs those place I took from .  It feel uncomfortable . It‚Äôs ok if they have their rules I‚Äôm able to follow up to keep it a safety place for everyone . For the guy who does placing weights to the ‚Äú
Right place ‚Äú he show his aggressive attitude to me . Feeling like he doing this,  it‚Äôs ‚Äú FOR ME ‚Äú ?
But guess again , coaches and member by coaching was ok to do no re-rack the weights , laughing louder .
I‚Äôm probably stay back from this 2 of my ‚Äú personal view ‚Äú
Simplicity of my review . Unfriendly staff , uncomfortable attitude .

author: Alex Martin
text: This is a great gym. Central location, not too busy and very up to date equipment. Staff are friendly and helpful, gym is clean, tidy and has good vibe. Enjoy working out here.

author: Hui Bing Chow
text:
Recently joined my colleagues to gym with Anytime Fitness (Tanjong Pagar) and it's been amazing so far!

Aside from the wide variety of equipments, there are free classes like pilates and HIIT every Monday and Wednesday as well! I must say the trainers are very informative and professional!

Also, the management team are very, very friendly and helpful! Thank you Mansor and Jay for being so patient towards us and our questions! :)

author: saltedbun
text: I really appreciated the trial session and the warm welcome and introduction to AF TJPG gym yesterday. I could see how well managed it was, and how the members enjoy their workout sessions at AF TJPG. Thank you for your hospitality! ‚ò∫Ô∏è

author: Joseph TSC
text: I love this outlet soo much! Definitely one of the best outlets I‚Äôve been to! Staff are very friendly, always smiling and helpful in correcting forms and postures. Equipment is soo good even before renovation. But after renovation it got even better! Toilets are very well maintained too! Though i stay at khatib, id gladly make my way here whenever i can:) keep it up!!

author: Sophie Med
text: Whilst your gym looks very well equiped, your team need more proactiveness. Booked a tour/trial at a place that is not in my neighbourhood. Gets an email asking me if I want a trial on X day. Goes there on my OFF day only to be told I should have booked somewhere else. Which made sense. But if on your system you could see my address why  didn't you tell me I should have booked somewhere else first, before making me commute to the gym. There is no respect for people's time or interest. I will not book another location, I will just choose to spend my money and my time somewhere else.

author: Voo CF
text: After so many gym had visited. This gym was the first would like to rate because met the staff name Mamsor (if no wrong) he was damn good. He help to stretch after deadlift session, he was kinda friendly.

author: Lionel Wong
text: After the renovation the gym has more energy, with a full range of equipment from power racks, cable machines for an accessory work out, and a calisthenics area. The trainers are also knowledgeable and friendly.

author: Joshua Tan
text: Great gym, newly renovated and very well-equipped with every machine you‚Äôd ever need. Staff are friendly and very helpful! Highly recommend and one of my favorite AFs to visit

author: Cris
text:
I drop by to this gym since im a member of anytime fitness and my office is near.
But when i change my shirt coz im also wanted to  exercise on my shoulder only. The gym manager stop me when i get the equipment coz he said im not wearing short.
No warning, nor notice or even said maybe nxt time.just directly said i cant work out coz im not wearing proper atire. But i saw some gymer also wearing office pants. (I talk to the manager and ask why some is also wearing pants. He said its there member.) So meaning im also not a member?

I think you need to educate your staff on how to get more members instead.not like pushing us off the gym.

author: Syed Mahdzar Syed Kasim Al-Shahab
text: The best AF gym for me! best vibe and most of they got all the machines that i love and needed! In house trainer Mansor was friendly, helpful and he'll make you feel welcome!

author: Kannina
text: I've been here sporadically over the years, and the latest layout is the best utilization of space I've seen at any AF, love it

author: nischal bhatt
text: AFTP is a wonderful place to go to to destress after a hard day's work at the office. Equipment is top-notch, facilities are impeccable, and this gym has set the standard for a fitness club. Kudos to Sulaiman and the team!

author: Lim Brandon
text: Most organised gym i have been. Weights placed properly and when machines are spoilt action immediately and constantly improving they just expanded and added more racks

author: charles augier
text: This place used to offer great value for money when I joined 5 years ago. Unfortunately it's become very crowded and the rates have increased. The staff also lacks basic customer service & relationship skills. (Cheesy) music is blasting and it is not really an enjoyable experience to work out in this branch.

author: Mansor Mohd Yusof
text: With the new management in place, the gym feels like a completely new place. Gym already looks brighter, neater, new treadmills in place (goodbye squeaking). They said there will be lots more to come, can't wait!

author: Kien Kieu
text: New management (except for the girl) is the most unfriendly team of AF in Sg. If you don't mind uptight people who are slow to respond to requests then this is no issue for you. The number of time i encountered micro-aggressions this gym since 2020 can't be contained by the number of fingers one has.

author: Jethro Eng
text: That's the only Anytime branch in the Tanjong Pagar area. If not, the nearest one will be at Chinatown Point which is not so convenience especially for the lunchtime workout. Good thing here is there is 5 shower cubicle (the male side. If they can separate the toilet from the shower will be even better but I don't think it can be implement easily. If you need to look for toilet, I suggest you can use the one just outside the gym.

author: Benjamin Zhan
text: One of the better set up and equipped anytime fitness gym's in Singapore. The only two things missing to really be a 5 star gym is to have a proper squat/deadlift platform and a cable machine for low row and lat pull down

author: Peter Lee
text:
one of the two gym managers (the chubby one) is outlandishly rude, and quite ignorant towards members' requests for assistance. couple weeks ago, tried to seek help from her as i had left my shoes in the changing room. despite dialling the office (a cellphone number, no less) 6-7 during office hours, not a single one was answered. sought the help of a trainer at another AF brancher closer to home. he sent an email, but no response to that either. just now, i walked into the gym without tapping my key, as the door was already wide open. relatively new member, so did not know i had to tap at all times. then this lady follows me to the men's changing room and tells me to come out to tap the key, "while i am god damn changing". at any other gym or workplace, this would be considered sexual harrassment. but i guess this is the accepted normal at AF Tanjong Pagar.

* update march 2018, just saw the above mentioned staff enter the male changing room AGAIN. Despite having male staff around to help out with whatever it is that she was attempting to achieve. Guess this is the accepted norm here, given that its continued for so long. Or maybe the gym management simply doesnt give two cents about common etiquette.

author: Chong moh Teo
text: Was intro to come here by Nicole and I like the atmosphere here as the staff here is very friendly even the members here has this friendly vibe going on too. Makes working out here more positive too. Toilets here is the cleanest too. Thank you anytime fitness Tanjong Pagarü§ó ‚Ä¶

author: Clayton
text: Love the gym but the music at night is so loud its making me deafüòµ‚Äçüí´please turn it down a bit‚Ä¶its too deafening when you have your own earpods and the music at the background is like a night club ‚Ä¶

author: Chris Louisa Ng
text: Good trainer,, fun workout, place is clean, staff are friendly

author: Josh Wong
text: Very big gym and friendly staff! Recommended!

author: TheFitnessTheory
text:
Great equipment, convenient location if you're working in tanjong pagar. Some pieces of equipment are missing (could definitely do with some Assault bikes and adductors/abductors machine) but overall, it's pretty decent compared to the other branches I've seen.
(I recently moved from AF paya lebar to here and I'm clearly enjoying it).

author: Ethan
text: Horrible. Told them I lost my credit card and will update my card. Due to work commitments, I forgot to update them, they terminate my agreement after a couple of months and demand full payment for the length of membership plus interests and late charges. Best part is they didn't even bother to call. They just engage a debt collection firm and demand payment. All this adds up to $900. Horrible experience.

author: Yuhui Wang
text: not friendly staff, impatient and will give you a face when you inquire info. If your friend is waiting for you at the chair for just a minute,the female staff will chase your friend out immediately. I dont like some of the staffs here

author: JJ LIANG
text: Excellent environment with friendly and helpful staffs

author: Julian Ang
text: A decently sized AF gym which i enjoy going.  It's pleasant and more than decently equipped. Peak hour crowds are acceptable even on the weekends.

author: Jayme Zhong
text: Can easily say that this is one of the best AFs in town after trying out a few different locations! Instructors are friendly and welcoming and they sometimes give out free bananas ü•π‚ú®üçå can it get any better than this? ‚Ä¶

author: Amr Behery
text: Highly recommend this gym for anyone who is after a clean and friendly environment with good vibes. Mansour is a legend and Jay is helpful and accommodating! You will be looked after here for sure.

author: Daniel Ng
text: I like this gym because of many equipment and spacious space to training, however team can be more polite by telling us to reduce the weight lifting noise , I always handling the weight properly and not throwing the weight lifting on the floor by creating such bang sounds , I even seems some people handle it unprofessional by throwing the weight equipment to the floor resulting unpleasant noise , me and also my friend always telling ourselves not to let the dumbbell hit the floor while we training , unsure what happened that one of your team chubby tan looking guy was starring at me in such a rude way by noticing me that I am the one making "bang "sound from the equipment , I always keep remind myself minimise the noise while I using every equipment ,by the way this is a gym fitness not Yoga class, what's your team expect for fitness won't produce some noise due to handle or lifting equipment, how to you use all the gym facilities soundless at all?

author: Lisha Soh
text: The Anytime Fitness staff are helpful, accommodating and friendly. The premises are also spacious and well-kept. Always a pleasure to come here!

author: David H
text: I visited this gym in March 2020, got a fever on the next day, and unfortunately tested positive for COVID-19. Hopefully the sanitation standard has been improved since then.

author: Sarbjit Singh
text: Friendly, professional personal trainer especially Mansor. My go to gym 4am or 11pm. Only gym trainers keeps a lookout for all and will throw in useful tips and advices.

author: Marlene Murray
text: We really had a great time here! Racks, a multi press, benches, a lot of barbells and very friendly people, everything you need to have a great workout.

author: Justin Tan
text: By far the friendliest bunch of trainers compared to some of the ones I've been to. Trainer Mansor and his team makes it a fun place to work out in. Can't wait for the upgrades they are making in the coming months.

author: Scott Haese
text: All equipment in good condition. Not crowded during our visits. Little warm for us but that's Singapore. Clean bathrooms and showers. Free WiFi.

author: Habri
text: Hands down one of the best. Staffs are always ready to help and aid when members need them. Special mentions to Jay, Mansor, Shah, Sulaiman, Amir & Din. Kudos to the whole AF Tanjong Pagar Team!

author: Haritha Jayagopi
text: Gym is good, but maybe needs more equipment. nice for people living around this neighborhood. Free and easy during non peak hours.

author: JayJay Ong
text: Friendly trainers and staffs. Got even better after the expansion, with deadlift platform and hammer strength machines! Will recommend ü§ô ‚Ä¶

author: Luke Newton
text: Very friendly staff and awesome equipment. Location is very convenient as well !

author: Faris Swift
text:
Been gymming with this outlet for years now, I extremely love the new renovation/revamp of the place.. give the place a new character and vibeüëçüèª
Bonus also they have fun and supportive staffs and trainers üëü

author: Bucky Hussain
text:
Good but not great. There are some hogs who will use every machine and weight and be super aggro when you ask them to share. Management don‚Äôt care about these hogs.

Could also do with a second cable machine

author: Ding Max
text: The attitude is very very bad and do not contact the guest with proper way. Vey very bad.

author: Sub weev
text:
The gym is quite spacious, numbers of equipment are enough, but didn‚Äôt maintain that much.
And for the record, management are so Rude. No etiquette at all.

author: Afi Hafiz
text: By far one of spacious gyms I've seen for Anytime Fitness, ample of equipments yet conducive, and the gym is not usually packed. That's a thumbs up right there.

author: YS Lim
text: Spacious and new equipment. Good vibes and next to Tanjong Pagar station. Definitely one of the best in Singapore!

author: Tony Han
text: Pretty bad experience Though that's near my apartment. I'm driven out just because I'm not wearing shorts as they like, without informing me, and I‚Äôm just using the running equipment (no damage to their equipment at all).

author: Jonathan Tan
text: Always looking forward to my gym sessions, manso , jay , Amir , shah , sulaiman and din did a great job creating a good culture at the gym , everyone wants the best for each other .

author: Lester Lam
text:
Shout out to Mansor. Great customer service. Looking great and hope to see you around at the gym.

Gym looks well equipped and clean üëç

author: Shawn Peter
text: Had a pleasant experience with Ms Rainey and she guided me through the entire process of signing up while carefully explaining everything. Great place with great people.

author: fairuz rashidah
text: Good environment,decent place,Awesome Instructor and the equipment jus Nice..Accept if got lyingdown hamstring leg machine,that will be Outstanding,Sorry to say abt sitting hamstring machine is not worth to train how heavy and how hard u pump and gain..it wont develop leg hamstring muscle properly,It Hurt the Backlower bone and targerting muscle is on then bicepculf leg...

author: Rajesh Rai
text: The best Anytime Fitness outlet that I have been to! Good range of equipment and clean showers.

author: jek lit
text: Beware. Zero customer service. Auto renew my membership without consent. Unable to withdraw the membership unless there‚Äôs some disability proof from doctor. The only reason will call you is to chase for your membership fee.

author: Gyunjeong Kang
text: Have many option to work out every day and trainers are so kind and professional to teach people. Recently there is renovated place so look fresh keep clean as well.

author: amin azwan
text: Big space and great layout. Definitely be coming back here again. Please add a Marpo Rope Machine just like the one at Nex, I'm sure there is space for at least 1. üòä ‚Ä¶

author: Fernando Russo
text: Excellent gym with super nice staff. Walk up to level 3 of the gallery

author: Y T
text: Sick gym, sick vibes, love the upgrade with the new equipments. Best gym to workout at for the good vibes. Thanks Mansor for all the help! :)

author: Ray Yip
text: Gym is very clean with good amenities and many friendly professionals who provide good advice

author: Babu KM
text: Excellent service, friendly

author: Elvis Tan
text: All the staffs are very nice n friendly. Highly recommend to sign up in this club. Thumbs up!

author: Esther Ng
text: trainers are extremely welcoming and nice! looking forward to gym here more often

author: Mike
text: Fully equipped gym at an affordable subscription. 24*7 access.

author: Faris Fauzi
text: Best and lovely staff(Rainey, Mansor, Muhammed, Affandy) comparing to other outlets I have been tooüíïüíï ‚Ä¶

author: Arun Vinayagame
text: Very good gym. Highly recommended.

author: RANI ETTIKKAN
text: Friendly and professional staff and trainers! the classes are very good, especially Trainer Mansor's HIIT class!

author: LEE LEE
text: Comfortable and functional gym with friendly and professional staffs.

author: Lucas Tomsik
text: Very close to tanjong pagar MRT station and a well equipped gym.

author: Mason Cockram
text: The personal trainer mansor is great, very helpful

author: Olivia Allan
text: Great equipments and friendly staff.

author: Charlie Thang
text: Huge space for an Anytime Fitness, not too crowded during a weekday lunchtime.

author: Kelvin

text:

The renovations have been fantastic.
The facilities are great, but the best part is they've gotten rid of the bad trainers.

text:
Hi there! 
We're thrilled to hear that you've had such a positive experience with us. Our team works hard to provide a welcoming and supportive environment for all our members, and it's always rewarding to know that our efforts are appreciated. We look forward to continuing to support you on your fitness journey and helping you achieve your goals. See you at the gym soon!
